aemsp_relatedArticleNumberFieldDescripti.sling:message: Maximum number of related Articles in this component

aemsp_relatedArticleMultifieldDescriptio.sling:message: Manually set related articles. Leave pathfields empty if you want the related articles to be automatically filled up to the limit.

aemsp_relatedArticlesNotValidPreError.sling:message: Not all paths that you selected meet the requirements:

aemsp_articleNotValidCurrentArticleError.sling:message: The selected article must not be the current Article

aemsp_articleNotValidLanguageError.sling:message: The selected article has to be chosen from the same language this component is placed on

aemsp_articleNotValidTypeError.sling:message: The selection has to be an article page

aemsp_articleNotValidPublishError.sling:message: The selection has to be an article, which has already been published
